snippet: The shingle-style house on 3.2 meticulously groomed acres is just a short stroll from the pristine surf at Two Mile Hollow Beach.
abstract: Shingle-style house on 3.2 meticulously groomed acres just a short stroll from the pristine surf at Two Mile Hollow Beach in East Hampton Village is poised to enter the market at $21.5 million.
lead_paragraph: The shingle-style house on 3.2 meticulously groomed acres is just a short stroll from the pristine surf at Two Mile Hollow Beach.
